00038 class ApiPrintResponse extends Response
00039 {
00046   public function __construct()
00047   {
00048     parent::__construct();
00049   }
00050   
00051   
00059   public function sendCallError($message = null)
00060   {
00061     $content = 'Error while process the request';
00062     
00063     if ($message !== null) {
00064       $content .= "\n".$message;
00065     }
00066     
00067     $this->setError(405, $content);
00068     $this->send();
00069   }
00070   
00071   
00079   public function sendLoginError($message = null)
00080   {
00081     $content = 'Error while process the login';
00082     
00083     if ($message !== null) {
00084       $content .= "\n".$message;
00085     }
00086     
00087     $this->setError(401, $content);
00088     $this->send();
00089   }
00090   
00091   
00099   public function sendTransformError($message = null)
00100   {
00101     $content = 'Error while process the transform URL to PDF';
00102     
00103     if ($message !== null) {
00104       $content .= "\n".$message;
00105     }
00106     
00107     $this->setError(503, $content);
00108     $this->send();
00109   }
00110   
00111   
00119   public function sendDisastrousError($message = null)
00120   {
00121     $content = 'A disastrous error occurred';
00122     
00123     if ($message !== null) {
00124       $content .= "\n".$message;
00125     }
00126     
00127     $this->setError(500, $content);
00128     $this->send();
00129   }
00130   
00131   
00140   private function setError($code, $message)
00141   {
00142     if (is_numeric($code) === false) {
00143       throw new Exception('code must be numeric');
00144     }
00145     
00146     $code = (int)$code;
00147     
00148     if (isset(Response::$status_text[$code]) === false) {
00149       throw new Exception('undefined code');
00150     }
00151     
00152     $this->status = $code;
00153     $this->content = $message;
00154   }
00155 }
